product_name: BIC Sport Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - Medium Blade - Fiberglass Shaft
long_description: Featuring a tough fiberglass shaft, the medium-blade BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling. Medium blade is ideal for all-around padding, racing, low-cadence paddling styles and those looking for a lot of power in the water. Fiberglass shaft offers light flex and high durability; the BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts from 67 - 83 in. Adjustable length is also ideal for multiple paddlers. Blade shape pulls smoothly through the water. Palm grip fits naturally in your hand, offering you refined control for a variety of paddle strokes.
short_description: Featuring a tough fiberglass shaft, the medium-blade BIC Sport Adjustable stand up paddle adjusts to cater to the water you're paddling.
